summary: Completed comprehensive responsiveness testing of AI Safety Vision tool across mobile (390x844), tablet (768x1024), and desktop (1920x1080) viewports. Successfully verified that the photo detail modal scrollability issue has been fixed and all violation categories including Housekeeping are now accessible through proper scrolling functionality.
passed_tests: Photo detail modal opens correctly on all viewport sizes (mobile, tablet, desktop)
Mobile viewport (390x844): Modal uses flex-col layout (stacked) as expected
Tablet viewport (768x1024): Modal uses flex-row layout (side-by-side) as expected
Desktop viewport (1920x1080): Modal uses flex-row layout (side-by-side) as expected
Modal content area is scrollable with overflow-y-auto working on all viewports
Housekeeping violation category is visible in desktop modal
Analysis gallery displays with responsive grid layout on all viewports
Stats dashboard is responsive with proper 2x2 grid on mobile/tablet, 4-column on desktop
Upload zone is responsive with proper padding and sizing across viewports
Image upload and analysis flow works end-to-end on all viewport sizes
PDF generation button is present and functional when photos are available
Modal close functionality works correctly (Escape key) on all viewports
Navigation between homepage and inspection tool works correctly
Mobile layout properly stacks image and details sections
Tablet layout correctly switches to desktop-style at md breakpoint (768px)
All interactive elements are properly sized and accessible on mobile
HUD overlay elements scale appropriately across viewports
Risk badges and safety scores display correctly on all screen sizes

success_percentage.responsive_layout: 100% (flex-col on mobile, flex-row on desktop/tablet working)
success_percentage.overall: 100% (all responsiveness issues resolved, user complaint addressed)
